body_html:
NVidia reported some promising results in training neural networks with native half-float
http://on-demand.gputechconf.com/gtc/2017/presentation/s7218-boris-gainsberg-training-deep-networks-with-half-precision-float.pdf

IE, apparently resnet-50 training works out of the box in native half-float ops with no decrease in accuracy
body_text:
NVidia reported some promising results in training neural networks with native half-float
http://on-demand.gputechconf.com/gtc/2017/presentation/s7218-boris-gainsberg-training-deep-networks-with-half-precision-float.pdf
IE, apparently resnet-50 training works out of the box in native half-float ops with no decrease in accuracy
body:
NVidia reported some promising results in training neural networks with native half-float  
http://on-demand.gputechconf.com/gtc/2017/presentation/s7218-boris-gainsberg-training-deep-networks-with-half-precision-float.pdf

IE, apparently resnet-50 training works out of the box in native half-float ops with no decrease in accuracy
